title: Viet Nguyen
text:
About me
Hi, I am currently a junior student majoring in Data Science at University of Economics Ho Chi Minh City (UEH). My research lies in multimodal models  and generative models. I’m also keen to work on models’ interpretability.


News

Apr 2024: I received the UEH Young Researcher 2024 Award.
Feb 2024: Our paper has been accepted at Journal of Uncertain Systems.
Mar 2023: Our paper has been accepted at ICICCT - 2023.
Feb 2023: I received the UEH Young Researcher 2023 Award.
Aug 2021: I was awarded the UEH Admission Scholarship.



Media Coverage

UEH Data Science student published 3 Scopus-indexed papers (in Vietnamese)
